name: Windows Gather Microsoft Office Word UNC Path Injector
author: SphaZ <cyberphaz@gmail.com>
description:
This module modifies a remote .docx file that will, upon opening, submit
        stored netNTLM credentials to a remote host. Verified to work with Microsoft
        Word 2003, 2007, 2010, and 2013. In order to get the hashes the
        auxiliary/server/capture/smb module can be used.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SMBHOST
options.description: Server IP or hostname that the .docx document points to

options.name: FILE
options.description: Remote file to inject UNC path into.

options.name: BACKUP
options.description: Make local backup of remote file.
